name: Target Shootout
description:
Take down the targets using three weapons: a pistol, machine gun, and sniper. You get thirty seconds to destroy all of the targets, otherwise you lose! There are 6 levels for each weapon. Good luck!

This is the first full game I have ever made, its a work in progress, and yeah the menus are pretty bad too, I'm working on em! Also, my skybox is messed up, currently working on a fix!

Scripts, UI, and weapon controllers (and bunch of other stuff I can't think of right now) made by: Unity FPS Microgame

Sniper made by: Creation Wasteland

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/affordable-assets-sniper-rif...

Machine gun made by: DzenGames

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/italian-machine-gun-44430

Pistol made by: Stargames Studio

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/pistol-92-175490

Farm houses, well, and fences made by: GBAndrewGB

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/village-houses-pack-63695

Music made by: Vertex Studios (AMAZING MUSIC BTW)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/absolutely-free-music-4883

Gun sound effects made by: Oliver Girardot (been using these forever, they are amazing)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155...

I think that's everything! Let me know any recommendations or fixes I need to make, I'm open to anything!
